Social Media Setup

How to Write a Series
Writing a series can be addictingâ€”for the author and the reader. This workshop will share some strategies, tools, and behind the scenes logistics that work for Maddie James, and might work for you.

meetings.title: June
speaker: Danielle Barclay
meetings.time: Networking at 12:00 pm, Business meeting at 12:30 pm, Speaker at 1:30 pm
meetings.location:
Norwich Township Safety & Services Building
5181 Northwest Parkway
Hilliard, OH 43026
meetings.topic:
Publicity & Marketing Tips
As an industry recognized award winning social media expert, she has created and implemented over 700 publicity campaigns. She conducts presentations for writers groups and has a passion for mentoring aspiring and debut authors.

meetings.title: July
speaker: Robin Yocum
meetings.time: Networking at 12:00 pm, Business meeting at 12:30 pm, Speaker at 1:30 pm
meetings.location:
Norwich Township Fire Station 83
4283 Davidson Rd
Hilliard, OH 43026
meetings.topic:
Keeping Motivated and Keep On Writing with Robin Yocum
Edgar-nominated author and former Columbus Dispatch investigative reporter Robin Yocum will share his tips on overcoming impediments that keep you from writing your first novel or staying on track with your current novel.

meetings.title: September
speaker: J. Leigh Bailey
meetings.time: Networking at 12:00 pm, Business meeting at 12:30 pm, Speaker at 1:30 pm
meetings.location:
Norwich Township Safety & Services Building
5181 Northwest Parkway
Hilliard, OH 43026
meetings.topic:
Mastering the Meet-Cute
This program will use examples from popular movies, television shows, and books to identify the main characteristics of an effective meet-cute, to recognize the basic formulas and tropes of the meet-cute, and to explore ways to create fresh versions of this classic plot device.

meetings.title: October
speaker: Suzanne Sabol
meetings.time: Business meeting at 10:30 am - 12:30, Speaker at 1:30 pm
meetings.location:
Norwich Township Safety & Services Building
5181 Northwest Parkway
Hilliard, OH 43026
meetings.topic:
Mapping Your Series
Suzanne will share her Series Bible she has developed and used. Any author contemplating or currently writing a series of connected books needs such a tool to track and keep everything straight.

meetings.title: November
speaker: Allie Pleiter
meetings.time: 9:30 am - 4 pm, Registration starts at 9 am
meetings.location: The Clintonville Woman's Club, 3951 N High St, Columbus
meetings.topic:
Chucky Writing Method
The afternoon will consist of writing time for attendees to work on their NANO projects.
Bring your laptops, extension cords and enthusiasm for a day of information and synergy of being in company of other writers.
